data.name: Alien Age
data.detailed_description:
You’re an alien stranded on Earth, advancing towns to the Space Age by providing resources so you can rocket home.

Aliens have been helping us since the stone age, from language to mobile phones and space travel. As an alien, you've crashed onto Earth and the technology is nowhere near where it needs to be for you to make repairs and get home. So, why not use the knowledge you have and catch them up to the space age?

Beat the game by bringing one town to the space age and launching a rocket. You’ll have to keep an eye on resource placement and improve your times in order to complete the space ages of all towns for a quadruple rocket launch spectacle!

Features:
- Multiple difficultly levels
- Timed and free-play modes
- Two maps to explore
- Time management and resource management gameplay

Alien Age is a rev share project created by the Indie Wizards group.

data.short_description: Alien Age is a chaotic merging single player game. As an alien, you combine and deliver a variety of resources before hopeful towns crumble to dust. Prime your engine and shine your saucer, towns are eager to see what the future holds… and they won't wait forever.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
